rows.label: tlk70000022_03_msg0001
rows.name:
There's a limit to how many
people and supplies we can
pack into this one shelter.

rows.label: tlk70000022_03_msg0002
rows.name:
We need more shelters and
they need to be bigger.
Ideally stronger, too.

rows.label: tlk70000022_03_msg0003
rows.name:
We can't sit back on our
arses just because we made
one decent shelter.

rows.label: tlk70000022_03_msg0004
rows.name:
There's a lot to be done and
time isn't on our side.
